channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- CODESYS Development System V3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- CODESYS Development System V3

item.title: CVE-2022-4048|2024-08-03T01:27:54.123Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v3
item.description: Inadequate Encryption Strength in CODESYS Development System V3 versions prior to V3.5.18.40 allows an unauthenticated local attacker to access and manipulate code of the encrypted boot application.
